attributes.action: Plant more trees to reduce CO2 in the atmosphere
attributes.additional_details: By saying less, I am not saying no trees, but less if possible. If we go into the future the way we are know we are going to see some negative effects such as flooding. We must act now and sign this petition not ignore it, the government needs to see it!
attributes.background: As time goes by, CO2 emissions are increasing and is having a negative impact on us which we WILL see in the future. To help with this problem, we must plant a significant amount of more trees than we currently do, to help remove CO2 from the atmosphere. We must also cut less trees if possible.
